docs.text: BlockIndex Documentation Welcome to the official documentation for BlockIndex. BlockIndex a highly flexible open source indexer that aims to work with all blockchains. Our core codebase is free and publicly available on GitHub. Getting Started If you're new to BlockIndex, you can start here. Installation
